question:
My uncle's house is situated on a hill. It has very beautiful hilly green rice field scenery.    There is a (1) ... farm at the backyard. My uncle really loves and keeps the chicken well.
The house is not (2)..., but it is lovely and clean. I love staying there. This is the place
where my uncle's family spends most of their time together. It has three bedrooms, a living
room, a dining room, a (3) ..., and two bathrooms.
At the front, there is a living room. Next to this room, there is a dining room. My uncle's
bedroom is near the dining room. The bedroom is (4)... and warm. There is a kitchen and
two bathrooms at the back of the house.
Each room has some furniture. My uncle (5) ... the furniture properly. They are not
expensive, but he always keeps them free from dust. He does this because he wants to
make his house seen as the nicest place to live in.
a. arranges
b.
chicken
C. neat
d. big
kitchen
e.​

related_questions.question:
Where is the living room?    a. on the first floor
b. on the basement
c. on the ground floor
d. on the second floor​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

" where is the living room? " ( dimana ruang tamu? )

C. on the ground floor ( dilantai dasar )

Penjelasan:

A. on the first floor ( salah ).

( dilantai pertama ) = bisa dinyatakan lantai pertama setelah lantai dasar

B. on the basement ( salah )

( di ruang bawah tanah ) = yg ditanyakan " dimana ruang tamu? " ruang tamu umumnya terdapat pada lantai dasar.

C. on the ground floor ( benar )

( dilantai dasar ) = ruang tamu terdapat pada lantai dasar.

D. on the second floor ( salah ).

( dilantai kedua ) = dilantai kedua biasanya terdapat kamar

= jadi jawabannya c. on the ground floor

related_questions.question: It is a kind of close.it is worn to cover the body in the clod weather.it is a​

Change these sentences into simple past tense, baseed on the given Marka in bracket! (number 1 to 3)    1. my family (go) to the cinema last week ( -, ? )

2. the student (study) in the laboratory yesterday ( +, - )

3. she (go) to Bandung two days ago (+, -)

4. the girl was very happy to hear the good news
 ( - ) .......

5. Active voice : the clever student brings a dictionary in his bag
 passive voice :.........​

answers.answer:
1. (-) my family did not go to the cinema last week.

(?) Did my family go to the cinema last week ?

2. (+) the student studied in the laboratory yesterday.

(-) the student did not study in the laboratory yesterday.

3. (+) she went to Bandung two days ago.

(-) she did not go to Bandung two days ago.

4. (-)

5. Passive voice: a dictionary is brought by student in his bag.

cmiiw

related_questions.question: Help me plisssss help help jawab semua​

answers.answer:
1. The climate of Bandung is cool.
2. Bandung is called Paris van Java because of its vibrant culture life.
3. Bandung recently face with growing traffic, pollution and other urban problems.

Jawaban:

Feeds

Penjelasan:

Kalimat tersebut adalah kalimat PRESENT TENSE

Jika ada subject he, she, it. Maka kata kerja nya harus diikuti imbuhan -s ataupun -es. Tetapi jika ada subject i, you, they, we. Maka kata kerja nya tidak diberi imbuhan -s ataupun -es.

Keterangan :

Semoga membantu.

Have a nice day :)

Jawaban:

1.we'll do the shopping if we have the time

2.liza would bring an umbrella if knew it was going to rain

3if i am in paris,i will see the eiffel tower

4.if sonny parks his car in the appropriate place,the police won't fine him

5he would have taken a long vacation if he had had time

6.i'd have changed job if i had been in your position

7.mary will happy if budi gives her a gold ring

8.if it had been cloudy i would have worn my raincoat

9i will buy an eraser if i need one

10if i decide to go to bandung ,i will take the train
